name: Hidden Word Reader
description:
A simple game which adds hidden words to books as you read them.

Features:

  • Light and dark colour schemes for reading
  • Multiple text sizes and fonts
  • A library of classic books from Sherlock Holmes to Alice in Wonderland, as well as the ability to add your own books as text files.

Planned future features:

  • Music
  • More informative save names
  • Extending the colour schemes to the rest of the user interface

Please let me know if there's any other simple features that would make this more enjoyable or accessible for you!
